p: In recent decades, the increasing importance of indigenous fruits as a source of nutrition security has been recognized. However, there are challenges associated with the production of many indigenous fruit trees including Mimusops zeyheri [ 34]. Identifying the challenge(s) is the first step in the attempt to devise potential solutions to overcome these bottlenecks. Some of the challenges currently affecting the potential commercialization of Mimusops zeyheri fruit are highlighted below.
